ROM.Changelog: ### Changelog 20160101 * Introduced Happy New Year Surprise * Introduced support for overclock GPU to 533MHz * Introduced MaxiTweaks in build.prop(Really nice) * Introduced Translates to Spanish in Settings * Launch SuperSU from Settings * Updated Strings in Changelog * Fixed OTA Updater for new users * Updated OTA Updater to 2.6 * Updated PNG's of OTA Updater * And More
